Class CellGrid

java.lang.Object
main.model.CellGrid
public class CellGrid extends Object
Represents an abstract version of the game.

    • getCell

      public int getCell(int x, int y)
      Retrieves cell at position (x,y) between (0,0) to (n-1,n-1), n being the Length of the grid.
      Parameters:
      x - - x position of the cell
      y - - y position of the cell
      Returns:
      The specific cell at x and y

      val - - New value of the cell
      Returns:

    • getGrid

      public int[][] getGrid()
      Returns the whole grid, mainly used for testing and display.
      Returns:
      int[][] - The grid represented as a 2d array of integers

    • setGrid

      public CellGrid setGrid(int[][] newGrid)
      Sets a 2d integer grid as this object's grid.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Regardless of whether newGrid is compatible, returns this object.

    • getUpEdge

      public int getUpEdge()
      Gets the top edge of the grid
      Returns:
